thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 25 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Countrywide Says Total Group Income For Quarter Lower At 145 Mln STG

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Countrywide Says Total Group Income For Quarter Lower At 145 Mln STG

organizations.name: brief-countrywide says total group income for quarter lower

text:
April 25 (Reuters) - Countrywide PLC:
* TOTAL GROUP INCOME FOR QUARTER WAS LOWER AT £145 MILLION COMPARED TO £162 MILLION FOR SAME PERIOD IN 2017.
* GROUP HAS MOVED SWIFTLY TO RESTORE EXPERTISE IN SALES AND LETTINGS
* ARE ENCOURAGED BY EARLY PROGRESS THAT IS BEING MADE IN SALES AND LETTINGS.
* IN SALES, WE HAVE SEEN AN IMPROVEMENT IN BOTH REGISTER OF PROPERTIES AVAILABLE FOR SALE AND IN OUR MARKET SHARE OF LISTINGS COMPARED WITH Q4 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
